articles.title: Kailash Kher Stops Gwalior Concert Midway, Calls Unruly Crowd 'Animals' After Security Breach
articles.description: In a major security breach during a concert in Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh, Bollywood singer Kailash Kher was forced to stop his performance midway. The event, organised to mark the birth anniversary of late Prime Minister Atal Bihari Vajpayee, turned chaotic when the crowd jumped barricades and climbed
